name: Geometry fire Dash
description:
The geometry up to the blows makes you almost impossible to a new level of challenge. Prepare to jump through thorny obstacles and a dangerous path.

The game of geometry up to the point of view is very simple that will entertain you throughout the day.
Geometry down Dash: jump and re-launch your way through geometry.
Geometry down dash is an arcade game based on rhythm. If you want to skip short, press left and if you want to jump in length, press the right button.

This game is very easy to play geometry Fire dash tunnel game and also very easy !!

Enjoy!!!
